Introduction
This topic contains information on notifying individuals of their eligibility for DEA, including
who is eligible for DEA
notifying
Veterans in disability compensation cases
surviving spouses in Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) cases
children of eligibility
, and
surviving spouses in Survivors Pension cases
providing notice in Federal Employees' Compensation (FEC) cases
, and
Military Services Coordinator (MSC) responsibilities regarding seriously injured service members
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Notification and Award Actions for Dependents' Educational Assistance (DEA)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
